availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Buckner Lendrum (Covington, KY Justice of the Peace, mayor pro tem, and bookkeeper)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, book keeper. Virginia native. Son of Thomas Keith Lendrum and Margaret Stokes. Book keeper in Covington in 1860. Appointed mayor pro tem of Covington in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 6.
"Covington News," Cincinnati Enquirer (Cincinnati, Oh.), November 15, 1862, p. 3.
"Deaths," Cincinnati Enquirer" (Cincinnati, Oh.), May 27, 1878, p. 5.
Find A Grave, John Buckner Lendrum (1804-1878), Memorial #141255558, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/141255558 (accessed May 10, 2017).
Williams & Co, *Williams' Covington and Newport Directory for 1866-67 (Covington, KY, 1866), 129.
